job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer with a strong NLP focus to design, develop, and optimize AI-driven language technology solutions. This role is ideal for someone passionate about natural language processing, machine learning, and applied AI, who enjoys working in a collaborative, fast-moving environment and wants to contribute to the success of a growing SaaS company., Train, fine-tune, and benchmark state-of-the-art ML models, leveraging recent advancements in deep learning.
   Develop and optimize Large Language Model (LLM)-based solutions, leveraging prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques to enhance language processing capabilities.
   Develop and automate scalable NLP pipelines for model evaluation, feature extraction, and fine-tuning, ensuring reproducibility, efficient data handling, and seamless orchestration of multi-step workflows.
   Engineer and extract meaningful features from structured and unstructured language data to improve model accuracy and robustness.
   Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate ML solutions into our platforms and services.
   Stay up to date with the latest NLP and AI research, identifying opportunities to incorporate cutting-edge techniques into our products.
job_details.full_text:
ML Engineer (NLP focus)

We are looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer with a strong NLP focus to design, develop, and optimize AI-driven language technology solutions. This role is ideal for someone passionate about natural language processing, machine learning, and applied AI, who enjoys working in a collaborative, fast-moving environment and wants to contribute to the success of a growing SaaS company., Train, fine-tune, and benchmark state-of-the-art ML models, leveraging recent advancements in deep learning.
   Develop and optimize Large Language Model (LLM)-based solutions, leveraging prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques to enhance language processing capabilities.
   Develop and automate scalable NLP pipelines for model evaluation, feature extraction, and fine-tuning, ensuring reproducibility, efficient data handling, and seamless orchestration of multi-step workflows.
   Engineer and extract meaningful features from structured and unstructured language data to improve model accuracy and robustness.
   Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate ML solutions into our platforms and services.
   Stay up to date with the latest NLP and AI research, identifying opportunities to incorporate cutting-edge techniques into our products.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and optimization of AI-driven language technology solutions, specifically mentioning Large Language Models (LLMs), prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). These are core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While ML Engineer skills are present (training, fine-tuning models), the focus on generative AI applications and LLMs aligns more closely with the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Train, fine-tune, and benchmark state-of-the-art ML models, leveraging recent advancements in deep learning' directly relates to the core process of creating and adapting machine learning models.
job_tasks.phrase: Train, fine-tune, and benchmark state-of-the-art ML models, leveraging recent advancements in deep learning

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and optimize Large Language Model (LLM)-based solutions, leveraging prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques to enhance language processing capabilities' describes the core process of working with generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and optimize Large Language Model (LLM)-based solutions, leveraging prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques to enhance language processing capabilities

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and automate scalable NLP pipelines for model evaluation, feature extraction, and fine-tuning, ensuring reproducibility, efficient data handling, and seamless orchestration of multi-step workflows' describes the process of building and maintaining data pipelines for ML tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and automate scalable NLP pipelines for model evaluation, feature extraction, and fine-tuning, ensuring reproducibility, efficient data handling, and seamless orchestration of multi-step workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Engineer and extract meaningful features from structured and unstructured language data to improve model accuracy and robustness' directly relates to preparing data for machine learning models.
job_tasks.phrase: Engineer and extract meaningful features from structured and unstructured language data to improve model accuracy and robustness

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate ML solutions into our platforms and services' indicates the need to build and integrate AI features into existing software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate ML solutions into our platforms and services

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Stay up to date with the latest NLP and AI research, identifying opportunities to incorporate cutting-edge techniques into our products' highlights the need for continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay up to date with the latest NLP and AI research, identifying opportunities to incorporate cutting-edge techniques into our products
